text: Kulaŋ 15.21 Lom 16.13 mu nudɨ ibi Saimon. Nɨbu Sailini kɨlebɨla hɨsɨŋ. Nɨbu nudɨ kualabɨla hen hɨne Jelusalem kɨlebɨla ivo ivo saŋ vemalɨ. Nɨbu Alekɨsadelɨ dɨ Lufusɨ dɨ iaganɨlu. Nɨbu Jelusalem kɨlebɨla ivodaŋ aba udaci sagaŋ hɨsɨŋ kulemɨlɨ agɨlaŋ kɨlɨ cɨgaŋ kɨlikua lama ifɨci uu agadɨ nusaŋ iguavɨci havɨmalɨ.
